author: Soiz2015
title: Highly recommended hotel in NY City!
text: Nice surprise! Perfect location and wonderful staff:) Everyone was extremely helpful and pleasant. The rooms come with free breakfast which is a great advantage. It is a walking distance from the Empire State Building and Broadway. Perfect!
